insert into board(title, content, bname, bid, hit, date, file_name, file_save_name, file_size, file_download_uri) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{bname}, #{bid}, 0, #{date}, #{file_name}, #{file_save_name}, #{file_size}, #{file_download_uri})
